Rancor:
     He walked inside the base and to Galvatron, when he saw him he took a step back, "Whoa, you're shiny!"
 aerosmith60@... wrote:Galvatron turned around as the base alerted him of a precense. He hailed the bot form his comm located outside it. "My name is Galvatron  come to my present position if u wish to speak" He closed the comm. He waited for the time to strike.
